title: Schedule and Market an Open House
description: An agent needs to schedule an open house for a new listing and market it online.

tasks.description: Select a date and time for the open house (e.g., Sunday, 1-4 PM) and add it to the MLS listing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the MLS with the open house details.

tasks.description: Create a social media post and a digital flyer to promote the open house.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates marketing materials for the event.

tasks.description: Schedule the social media post to be published a few days before the event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent schedules the post for optimal visibility.
